definition: insipid/diluted/weak/mild/light in color/tasteless/indifferent/(variant of 氮[dan4]) nitrogen
"water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
light (of food, not greasy or strongly flavored)/insipid/slack (sales)
off season/slow business season/see also 旺季[wang4 ji4]
to water down/to play down/to trivialize/to weaken/to become dull with time/to desalinate/desalination
Danshui or Tanshui town in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
potable water (water with low salt content)/fresh water
Danshui or Tanshui town in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
potable water (water with low salt content)/fresh water
to fade out (cinema)/to withdraw from (politics, acting etc)/to fade from (memory)

sentences.english: It produces round, light orange-colored fruits about the size of lemons.
sentences.chinese: 它的果實是圓形的，淡橙黃色，和檸檬一般大小。

sentences.english: His mouth was wide open--I could see far down into caverns of pale pink throat.
sentences.chinese: 它的嘴巴大張着，能一眼看見它淡粉色喉嚨的深處。

sentences.english: His dog is real light orange, so light orange he's almost white.
sentences.chinese: 他的狗的顏色是非常淡的橘黃，淡到幾乎成白的了。

sentences.english: Chapter 6 talks about the influence of Dong Qichang's simplicity on the following generations.
sentences.chinese: 第六章分析董其昌的“淡”的藝術對後世的影響。

sentences.english: Pale gold in color with a very fine mousse, the wine is aromatic on the nose.
sentences.chinese: 淡金黃色，似帶一抹慕司，此酒芬芳宜人。

sentences.english: Law, also known as white beans, pepper, fruit thin, long handles, light fragrance.
sentences.chinese: 豆椒又名白椒，果實皮薄，柄較長，香味淡。

sentences.english: Gu moon light knife edge, looking Linshao Xiao color up.
sentences.chinese: 一刀殘月淡觚棱，遙杛林梢曉色升。

sentences.english: The wine is a light golden yellow with lemony lights.
sentences.chinese: 此酒呈帶檸檬色澤的淡金黃色。

sentences.english: In late Quaternary the lake shallowed and its water became salt-water.
sentences.chinese: 第四紀早期湖深水淡，晚期湖淺水鹹。

sentences.english: Single pale pink large ruffled star.
sentences.chinese: 單瓣淡粉紅色大朵的縐折花。

sentences.english: I put some orangish tones to warming the image up.
sentences.chinese: 我提了一些淡橘色色調使畫面變暖。

sentences.english: She touched the thick mat of sandy hair on his chest.
sentences.chinese: 她摸着他那濃密的淡棕色胸毛。

sentences.english: Theon drained the last dregs of his ale and rose reluctantly to his feet.
sentences.chinese: 席恩喝乾他最後的幾滴淡啤酒然後勉強站起來。

sentences.english: So now, after years of bitching, I’m finally seeing a doctor.
sentences.chinese: 現在，在扯了一年淡之後，我終於來找醫生看病了。

sentences.english: Adult female brown, paler mantle pilgrimaging length of about 17 mm, the male moth slightly smaller.
sentences.chinese: 成蟲淡灰褐色，雌娥體長約17毫米，雄蛾略小。

sentences.english: The Guangdong rice wine is milder than those from the north of China.
sentences.chinese: 廣東米酒比中國北方的酒要淡一些。

definition: shade (of a color, i.e. light or dark)
light (of food, not greasy or strongly flavored)/insipid/slack (sales)
